commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Include default typing pairs when used with selection
commits.body: This was mistakenly augmenting the list of quotes from raw/links rather than the standard default typing pairs. Now includes the defaults with the sole addition of '' quotes.

commits.author: Martin Kühl
commits.body:
This change makes the `Raw` command structurally
more similar to the commands `Bold` and `Italic`.

In addition, this fixes a problem where invoking the `Raw` command
over a word using a keyboard shortcut would leave the caret before
the trailing ` instead of after it
(which is where both `Bold` and `Italic` leave it).

commits.author: René Schwaiger
commits.summary: Support hyphen as list item separator
commits.body:
Before this change the asterisk (*) was always used as marker for new
items. This lead to problems when we used a hyphen (-) in a list and
wanted to create a new item. For example, if we have the following list:

    - First item

and created a new item via “New Item” we got the following list:

    *- First item
    *

The new code produces the following (correct) output:

    - First item
    -

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Allow markdown parameters to be set via TM_MARKDOWN
commits.body:
For example you may want to set:

    TM_MARKDOWN = "/path/to/multimarkdown --nosmart"

Previously this would fail because TM_MARKDOWN was treated as a single command (with possible spaces in its path).

This mirrors textmate/bundle-support.tmbundle@0a12001c335da1e739a5a6d64368bb781914f50f
